items.title: Publicis Upgrades 2025 Guidance Following Mars and Paramount Wins
items.summary: Publicis Groupe upgrades 2025 guidance after successful quarter, following wins with Mars and Paramount.

items.title: Sudden Strike 5 Announced For Release in 2026
items.summary: Sudden Strike 5 has been announced for release in 2026, building off the success of the tactical series with new units and features.

items.title: Nvidia CEO disclaims US-China trade and export policy influence
items.summary: Nvidia CEO disclaims US-China trade and export policy influence during visit to China, addressing questions about the US H20 chip ban and tech conflict, stating he had not changed his position on the restrictions but kept Washington updated on AI developments.

items.title: 【AIに耳を与える】常時起動型AI「StandBy」クラウドファンディング開始
items.summary: AI-zen Inc. has started a crowdfunding campaign for an always-on AI called 'StandBy' which gives AI the ability to listen.

items.title: China is winning Donald Trump’s trade war
items.summary: China is winning Donald Trump’s trade war by being willing to risk a trade war the United States may lose, rather than kowtow to Trump.

items.title: H20 back online in China — IC design houses, cloud AI chipmakers breathe sigh of relief
items.summary: H20 back online in China, triggering surge of urgent orders from major Chinese cloud providers for Nvidia's chips, lifting sentiment across the AI semiconductor ecosystem.

items.title: AI Sucks Up A Growing Chunk Of VC Funding In The US
items.summary: Thanks to a record-breaking $40-billion funding round announced by OpenAI on March 31, VC-backed companies based in the U.S. raised $80 billion in the first quarter of 2025.

items.title: Brasileirão round 14: relief, drama and chance for new leader, table
items.summary: Brasileirão round 14 saw lots of emotion and drama as the Brazilian Championship continues. Flamengo remains the leader despite being defeated by Santos. Red Bull Bragantino has a chance to take the top spot.

items.title: iOS 26: Full list of new features and which iPhones support them
items.summary: Apple has launched iOS 26 with advanced AI features exclusive to certain iPhone models, including visual intelligence in screenshots and live translation across apps.

items.title: South Korea pushes physical AI development with new industry association
items.summary: South Korea is focusing on physical AI development by establishing a new industry association, aiming to position the country as a leading artificial intelligence power.

items.title: Honours even! São Paulo’s winless run against Red Bull Bragantino goes on
items.summary: Honours even! São Paulo’s winless run against Red Bull Bragantino continues as they draw 2-2. The match took place on Wednesday.

items.title: Regions Financial (RF) Reports Q2: Everything You Need To Know Ahead Of Earnings
items.summary: Regional banking company Regions Financial (NYSE:RF) will be announcing earnings results for Q2 this Friday morning.

items.title: 国内発のAIキャラチャットゲーム『オズチャット - Oz Chat -』正式リリース1周年を記念し大型アップデート＆コラボを発表
items.summary: The AI character chat game 'Oz Chat' from Japan celebrates its first anniversary with a major update and collaboration announcement.

items.title: Microsoft’s Copilot Vision can now see your entire desktop – but it probably won't judge you for the clutter
items.summary: Microsoft's Copilot Vision update allows AI to see your entire desktop, providing assistance without judgment

items.title: IPA Bellwether Q2 2025: Ad spend bounces back, favoring ‘short-term’ channels
items.summary: IPA Bellwether Q2 2025 shows a rebound in ad spend, particularly in 'short-term' channels, leading to questions about short-termism versus a shift in marketing strategy.

items.title: 【新サービス】WordPressでSEO記事を“数分”で自動生成。コンテンツ制作のDXを推進するAIライティングツール「ライターAI」提供開始
items.summary: AI writing tool 'Writer AI' launched to automatically generate SEO articles on WordPress in 'a few minutes,' promoting the advancement of content creation DX.

items.title: Wipro chairman: Clients adjusting to uncertainty
items.summary: Wipro chairman Rishad Premji discusses clients adjusting to uncertainty in a volatile external environment with macroeconomic pressures, despite a slight dip in IT services revenue. Wipro saw a significant rise in net income and operating margins. CEO Srini Pallia emphasizes AI's central role.

items.title: H20 reenters China: lifeline for AI startups, blow to GPU sovereignty
items.summary: H20 reenters China, providing a lifeline for AI startups but causing a blow to GPU sovereignty with setbacks like Manus exiting the market and DeepSeek R2 facing challenges.

items.title: Nvidia's Jensen Huang discusses AI, China's tech influence, and personal tech preferences
items.summary: Nvidia's CEO discusses AI, China's tech influence, and personal tech preferences during a media briefing in China addressing US-China trade relations and China's rising tech influence

items.title: primfunctions 0.1.3
items.summary: Prim AI Functions released version 0.1.3, offering new updates and features for AI development.

items.title: CNBC Daily Open: U.S. producer prices are flat — but they don't factor in imports
items.summary: U.S. producer prices remain flat without factoring in imports, but the impact of tariffs may not be fully understood until after Aug. 1 when updated tariffs go into effect.

items.title: Neymar shines as Santos beat leaders Flamengo, ease drop fears
items.summary: Neymar shines as Santos beat leaders Flamengo 1-0 in the 2025 Brasileirão, easing drop fears for Santos. The match was highly contested with few clear scoring chances.

items.title: New York's tech elite give Mamdani points for 'charisma' — and engaging with them at closed-door meet
items.summary: New York's tech elite are impressed by Zohran Mamdani's 'charisma' and engaging pitch at a closed-door meet, despite not having a presentation deck.

items.title: ガバナンスクラウド株式会社、役員会DXクラウド「Governance Cloud」にAzure OpenAI Serviceを利用し役員会専用AI「Governance Cloud AI」を提供開始
items.summary: Governance Cloud Corporation utilizes Azure OpenAI Service to offer Governance Cloud AI for board meetings via Director's Meeting DX Cloud.

items.title: David Corenswet Loves 'Star Wars' and 'The Rehearsal?' Dear God…
items.summary: David Corenswet discusses his love for 'Star Wars' and 'The Rehearsal Season 2' during the Superman press tour.

items.title: ⏳ Atlético Nacional close to sealing a new signing
items.summary: Atlético Nacional is close to signing César Haydar, a former Junior defender from Japan, as a reinforcement for the upcoming semester.

items.title: Trump says Coca-Cola will use real sugar in its US flagship drink. The company isn’t confirming that
items.summary: Trump says Coca-Cola will use real sugar in its US flagship drink, but the company isn’t confirming the move

items.title: Singtel-led group to build 8,900km Asian subsea cable with NEC
items.summary: Singtel-led group, with NEC, to build high-capacity subsea cable connecting Singapore and Japan to meet demand for data infrastructure driven by AI and cloud computing.

items.title: Anthropic Draws Investor Interest At More Than $100 Billion Valuation
items.summary: OpenAI rival Anthropic is drawing investor interest and may be valued at over $100 billion in its next investment round. The artificial intelligence startup is in the early stages of planning the round.

items.title: The Man Who Called Every Crypto Cycle Since 2017 Just Revealed His Blueprint for the $250K Bitcoin Run—And Why This Time Is Different
items.summary: The Man Who Called Every Crypto Cycle Since 2017 reveals his blueprint for the $250K Bitcoin run and explains why this time is different, despite having already built and sold a media empire for over $150 million. Ran Neer has been heavily involved in crypto since 2016.

items.title: Akuma.AI Transforming Scribbles Into Top Anime Art
items.summary: Akuma.AI is an AI tool that can transform crude scribbles into professional-grade anime-style illustrations, demonstrating its powerful capabilities in a new promotional video.

items.title: Trump Announces Massive Investments to Steer America Closer to Energy, Tech Dominance
items.summary: President Trump announced $92 billion in energy and technology investment to bring America closer to dominance in those fields.

items.title: Jane Street: SEBI’s moment of reckoning
items.summary: SEBI's moment of reckoning with Jane Street case must lead to systemic reforms to protect India's markets from becoming algorithmic battlegrounds.

items.title: Scale AI Lays Off 200 Employees: 'We Ramped Up Our GenAI Capacity Too Quickly'
items.summary: Scale AI is laying off 200 employees and 500 contractors as part of a major restructuring, following Meta's purchase of a 49% stake. This comes just weeks after the CEO was absorbed into a new superintelligence lab.

items.title: gabiteodoru-parseq 0.1.3
items.summary: gabiteodoru-parseq 0.1.3 is a Q language to Python translator with AI-powered disambiguation, aimed at advancing research in programming language translation.

items.title: Unusual protest: Dorival Jr offers GLASSES to the fourth official
items.summary: Coach Dorival Júnior offers glasses to fourth official in protest of refereeing during soccer match.

items.title: PraisonAI 2.2.69
items.summary: PraisonAI 2.2.69 is an AI Agents Framework with Self Reflection, combining various tools into a low-code solution for building and managing multi-agent LLM systems.

items.title: Red Bull Bragantino and São Paulo set for BR-2025 showdown
items.summary: Red Bull Bragantino and São Paulo will face off in a Brasileirão-2025 match this Wednesday at 9:30 PM. The game will take place at Cícero de Souza Marque.

items.title: False rumor claims Harris demanded Trump's arrest and impeachment
items.summary: False rumor claims Harris demanded Trump's arrest and impeachment based on unverified 'explosive evidence' circulating on social media.

items.title: copick-torch added to PyPI
items.summary: copick-torch, a new tool for Torch utilities, has been added to PyPI specifically for copick.

items.summary: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. encourages investors in UnitedHealth, Bitfarms, or Reddit to inquire about their rights in class action lawsuits for losses suffered

items.title: Can a gaming laptop replace your PC? I put the MSI Titan 18 HX AI to the test for three weeks
items.summary: Can a gaming laptop replace your PC? The MSI Titan 18 HX AI is a powerful, heavy option for top-tier performance and some portability compared to a tower PC.

items.title: This new catalyst destroys "forever chemicals" within just "seconds"
items.summary: This new catalyst destroys 'Forever Chemicals' within seconds, offering a sustainable solution for pollution control.

items.title: OpenAI taps Google Cloud to access much-needed GPUs for ChatGPT
items.summary: OpenAI is accessing GPUs for ChatGPT through Google Cloud, improving cloud infrastructure for AI and adding Google Cloud as a hardware supplier.

items.title: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. Reminds Investors That Class Action Lawsuits Have Been Filed Against Vestis, Reckitt, and Tempus and Encourages Investors to Contact the Firm
items.summary: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. is urging investors who suffered losses in Vestis, Reckitt, or Tempus to contact the firm to discuss their options regarding class action lawsuits that have been filed against these companies.

items.title: Missouri Faces Surge in Tick Borne Alpha-Gal Syndrome: Health Officials Urge Vigilance - NewsBreak
items.summary: Missouri health officials warn of surge in tick-borne alpha-gal syndrome as Lone Star ticks spread

items.title: 'Latam-GPT' adapts to local dialects
items.summary: 'Latam-GPT' adapts to local dialects with collaboration from over 30 Latin American institutions to create a version of ChatGPT trained on local languages and nuances.

items.title: China builds underwater data center
items.summary: China is building an underwater data center to reduce cooling costs and meet the increasing demand for computing power driven by artificial intelligence. Cooling facilities currently require large amounts of water, posing a challenge as water supplies are limited in many regions.

items.title: SWL Miner: A Unique Opportunity for Smart Investors
items.summary: SWL Miner offers a unique opportunity for smart investors to tap into the potential of cryptocurrency mining with a user-friendly platform and world-class support team, providing a seamless way to earn passive income through cloud mining.

items.title: heaven-bml 2.4.4
items.summary: heaven-bml 2.4.4 is a GitHub project management tool designed for AI agents to improve the Build-Measure-Learn cycle. It aims to enhance collaboration and efficiency in developing AI projects.
